decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, undated, received 04/02/2015; PC-14/034/02, dated November 21 2014, received 28/04/2015; Door specification, undated, received 28/04/2015; Schedule of Works, unnumbered and undated, received 28/04/2015; RMKT090001-7, dated 2012, received 19/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - All associated equipment is to be removed if no longer in operation, and any disruption to building fabric shall be made good to match its surroundings in materials, colour and texture within one month of the removal.
Condition : 4 - The glazing of the original screens facing the proposed partitions shall be professionally cleaned directly prior to the installation of the partitions.

Condition : 5 - Decorative features and signage on the doors to be replaced shall be carefully removed at the commencement of works and stored securely during construction.  They shall first be recoded photographically in situ and then replaced in an equivalent position on the new doors before the works hereby approved are brought into use.  (NOTE: You should discuss the precise details of this work with The Friends of Isleworth Public Hall charity before carrying it out.)
description: Refurbishment and replacement of doors to meet fire regulations, replacement of existing fixed rooflight with openable rooflight, and the installation of partition walls, an intruder alarm, internal fans and ducting, and external air bricks.
